title: Top 5 JavaScript Tricks
description: Master JavaScript with these handy tips...
content: 1. Use const and let instead of var, const is for values that never change, while let is for re-assignable ones. This avoids scope issues and makes code cleaner.
2. Arrow functions: Arrow functions ()=>{} are shorter and automatically bind this, making them great for callbacks and concise code.
3. Template literals: Instead of 'Hello ' + name, use `Hello ${name}`. It‚Äôs easier to read and supports multi-line strings.
4. Error handling with try...catch: Always wrap risky code in try...catch to prevent apps from crashing and to give meaningful error messages.
5. Strict comparison ===: Use === instead of == to avoid type conversion surprises. It ensures both value and type are the same.

title: Time Management Hacks
description: Save hours every week with these hacks...
content: 1. Prioritize with the 80/20 rule ‚Äì focus on tasks that give the most results.
2. Use a to-do list ‚Äì write down 3 important tasks daily and finish them first.
3. Avoid multitasking ‚Äì do one task at a time for better efficiency.
4. Set time blocks ‚Äì work in focused 25‚Äì50 minute sessions, then take a short break.
5. Limit distractions ‚Äì keep your phone on silent or use apps that block social media.
6. Plan tomorrow today ‚Äì spend 5 minutes at night preparing for the next day.
7. Use deadlines ‚Äì even self-made ones boost focus and productivity.
